caption.title: Change in the risk of AHS persistence in the Western Cape Province (WCP) as a function of the timing of the introduction.
caption.p: Distribution of the duration of the outbreaks generated from 40 independent incursion events occurring at the first day of each month between January 2012 and December 2015. Here we considered incursions occurred in the largest population of plains zebra reported in the WCP (N = 168) at the start of each simulation. Horizontal black bars show the mean outbreak duration.
Click here for additional data file.
